lead_paragraph: Ivan Basso led Team CSC to victory in the fifth stage of the Tour of Italy yesterday. Team CSC finished the 35-kilometer time trial from Piacenza to Cremona in 36 minutes 56 seconds as the race returned to Italy after four stages in Belgium. Sergiy Honchar of Ukraine took the overall leader's pink jersey as his T-Mobile team finished second.
